author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 1/2   I am starting a Super PAC with my initial commitment of $150 million to help end the crippling dysfunction in Congress

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 2/2   I have therefore sent the following letter to the relevant committees and leaders of Congress: https://t.co/EGcuHvzou4

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: I’ll be speaking with @ScottWapnerCNBC on @CNBC @HalftimeReport today at 12:30pm ET

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: I’ll be speaking with @PoppyHarlowCNN on Quest Means Business @CNN International today at 4pm ET
